name: AppXen
tag_list: app-builder, mobile-apps, native-app-builder, ios, iphone, ipad, apps, android
overview:
We’re starting an App Revolution, to Change the Face of App Development Forever

Normally to develop an app you would need to have the platform required for development, learn how to code using the sdk, purchase devices to test on and if you want to develop for multiple device types you have to start this entire cycle all over again.

AppXen is designed to allow people ranging from absolute beginners to seasoned experts to design, deploy and track multi platform native apps. The interactive AppBuilder allows you to build iPhone iPad and Android apps right from a Browser, iPad, iPhone, Android or Desktop computer.

Here are some of AppXen’s features:

  • Automatically Generate Native UIs from Photoshop files.
  • Create Custom Interactive Interfaces with the Visual App Builder.
  • Backup/Retrieve App Data with builtin Local/Cloud Storage.
  • Track User Interaction, InApp Purchases, and other Analytical Data in Real Time with the App Analytics Platform.
  • Connect with Social Networks and other 3rd party services from your app.
  • Design, Customize, Publish and Track Native App Ideas right from a Browser, iPad, iPhone, Android or Desktop.
